===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A yellowish-brown powder used in traditional [[Mongolian]] medicine "to remove ''heat'' from the lungs, to relieve cough and dyspnea in the treatment of cough due to tuberculosis, dyspnea in the aged, a depressed sensation and stuffiness in the chest".
